headline: Has Abbott Stock’s Valuation Shifted With Expanded FDA Approvals in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Abbott Laboratories is undervalued, fairly priced, or perhaps even a hidden bargain? You are not alone, as many investors are taking a closer look at this healthcare giant. The stock is up 9.8% year-to-date, despite a recent 6.9% dip in the last month. This highlights how sentiment and risk perception can change quickly. Investors have been reacting to headline-grabbing developments such as innovations in Abbott's medical device segment and new product...
